attributes.action: stop using public money to pay his cleaning bills, and pay for it from his own finances like normal people do
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am at a loss why the public should finance the cleaning of the Prime Minister's personal accommodation. The mess is made by himself and his family - let them pay for the cleaning. They earn enough! (Although, as he is expecting us and future generations to pay for the mess he and colleagues have created with the national economy, it is maybe no surprise that he doesn't see any problem with us funding the clearing up of his personal mess as well).

rejection.details: Any comments relating to the system of MPs' expenses should be communicated to the House of Commons.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
